portfolio.title: CAREER_PERSUIT
portfolio.description: Career_PERSUIT is an online job application portal connecting job seekers with employers.Companies can post job opportunities, and job seekers can apply with their details, ensuring a seamless experience for both.

portfolio.title: FINFIND
portfolio.description: FINFIND basically to simply banking and finance related applications to be able to serve people from various backgrounds who might not have the same knowledge about the applications as others

portfolio.title: VOLTSUPPLY
portfolio.description: VoltSupply is a website showcasing high-quality batteries for various uses. It features a selection for commercial and personal needs, demonstrating our commitment to reliable service and prompt delivery. This site is for project demonstration only.
